::Aerotaur::
      He glared at the monitor and shakes his head.  He opens a com channel to Windlord, Termitron, and the other original Chivtrons along with the Taurusoids.  "We're leaving now.  We're going to fly out of here.  It's no longer safe.  We're outnumbered and vastly outgunned.  When we leave I'm taking the Taurusoids to find Chaostaur.  Someone must contact me with the location of our new base."
